ingredients.ingredient: 2 tablespoons dry ranch dressing mix (such as Hidden Valley Ranch®)

cookingTips: Chicken thighs stay moister than breasts - don't overcook them beyond 165°F
Let the pan get hot before adding the chicken to develop proper browning
Render the skin side first to release fat that helps cook and flavor the meat
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Show how to use ranch seasoning for a modern blackened chicken thigh with crispy skin.
